resources.string: Say \"digits\", \"forecast\" or \"phones\" to choose the grammar, language model or phonetic decoder example.
To try recognition of digits: say something like \"one two three four five\".
To try recognition of a weather forecast like \"sunny spells on Wednesday\".
To try phonetic recognition say anything.
Hi, welcome to Starbucks, how may I take your order? \n 1. May I get a tea? \n 2. Can I have a coffee?
Sure! Would you like green tea or black tea? \n 1. I would like green tea. \n 2. I would like black tea.
Sure! Would you like sugar or cream with your coffee? \n 1. Sugar, please. \n 2. I would like cream please.
Sure thing! That will be $2.75. Will you be paying with card or cash today? \n 1. I will be paying with card. \n 2. I will be paying with cash.
